thread.title: Jamaal Charles Suffers a Pretty Scary Knee Injury
thread.title_full: Jamaal Charles Suffers a Pretty Scary Knee Injury | Complex

author: Brian Josephs
title: Jamaal Charles Suffers a Pretty Scary Knee Injury
text:
UPDATE (10/11/15): It's not looking good.
Chiefs HC Andy Reid said the preliminary reports are that Jamaal Charles tore his ACL.
— Adam Schefter (@AdamSchefter) October 11, 2015 Sometimes injuries aren't as bad as they look. Ben Roethlisberger looked like he was going to be gone for a long while by the way his knee bent a few weeks ago. Turns out it was just an MCL sprain—and that's "just" in relation to what couldn't been an ACL tear.
That said, it's hard not to cringe at the way Jamaal Charles , the Chiefs ' main weapon, tweaked his knee against the Bears. Note how the below injury comes from how he planted his foot rather than a tackle. Also note how much pain he's in as he's helped off the field.
Jamal Charles is out for life https://t.co/XPdykQCTgz
— Nick Amato™ (@_tamato_) October 11, 2015 We'll update you on the diagnosis.
[ via Nick Amato ]
